nodes.bodyText: Isn't msgs operated from different threads ? Noticed only now :(
E.g. it should be StringBuffer, not builder. Right?

Done in 40584ec - if approved, I also merge it to master.
Btw. the code was ready for being used from multiple threads - see all the msgs.append("x' + a + " y " + b + " z" + c) concatentations that are done in single thread and only then placed into the msgs object. Why did I not used StringBuffer then? I know I wanted...
